#Enter your code here
# Enter your code here. Read input from STDIN. Print output to STDOUT
t=int(raw_input())
for i in xrange(t):
    s=raw_input()
    flag=0
    flag1=0
    hm=list(set(s))
    #print hm,s
    if len(hm)==26:
        flag=1
    if len(s)%2==0:
        first=s[:len(s)/2]
        second=s[len(s)/2:]
        #print first,second
        if first==second[::-1]:
            flag1=1
    else:
        first=s[:len(s)/2]
        second=s[(len(s)/2)+1:]
        #print first,second
        if first==second[::-1]:
            flag1=1
    if flag1==1 and flag==1:
        print "palingram"
    elif flag1==1:
        print "palindrome"
    elif flag==1:
        print "pangram"
    else:
        print "none"
